defaults.title: Audi is virtualizing the shop floor with virtual PLC
defaults.subtitle: Decoding the future of energy

links.label: Gridscale X Protection Data Manager Handle growing volumes of protection data efficiently. Our software automates relay data imports, saving up to 80% of time, increasing accuracy, and providing a single source of truth for grid stability.

Dynamic Line Rating Gridscale X Dynamic Line Rating calculates line capacity in real-time using local weather data. Increase capacity by 10-15% over 90% of the time, reduce redispatching costs, and bridge capacity gaps.

Dynamic Security Assessment Transport 30% more power through existing lines. Our automated software provides real-time stability assessments to increase grid capacity, improve situational awareness, and prevent blackouts. Push your grid limits securely.

Advanced Distribution Management Manage grid complexity and the energy transition. Spectrum Power ADMS integrates DERs, visualizes processes, and optimizes assets across all voltage levels to ensure reliable power, reduce costs, and boost efficiency.

Gridscale X LV Management Handle outages up to 30% faster and cut model maintenance time in half with Gridscale X LV Management. This smart co-pilot SaaS provides guided workflows to enhance grid stability, optimize assets, and resupply power faster.

Network Model Manager Unleash network model management with Gridscale X. Our fast, scalable, and open platform provides a single source of truth for grid data. Keep models consistent, boost team productivity, and accelerate planning and operations.

PSS E The industry benchmark for transmission planning and analysis. PSS®E delivers trusted results and unmatched automation. Save time and streamline complex workflows with over 2,000+ open Python™ APIs.

PSS SINCAL PSS®SINCAL is an all-in-one simulation software for electric and pipe networks. Reliably plan expansions, analyze protection, and integrate renewables across LV, MV, and HV systems with fast, accurate calculations.

Gridscale X Meter Data Management Simplify metering with our scalable, vendor-agnostic MDM. Automate data operations, resolve 99.9% of issues, and improve billing accuracy. Get the job done 85% faster and future-proof your utility against vendor lock-in.

Gridscale X Prepay Gridscale X Prepay protects utility revenue with a central wallet for real-time rating, flexible tariffs & debt recovery. This improves cash flow while empowering consumers with budget control & self-service.

Gridscale X Meter Data Management SaaS Manage electric, water, and gas meter data with our vendor-agnostic MDM SaaS. Avoid vendor lock-in, increase billing accuracy, and reduce TCO. Deploy 3x faster with a scalable, secure, and future-proof cloud solution.

Gridscale X Meter Data Management for Water A vendor-agnostic MDM for water utilities. Process smart meter data to detect leaks, backflow, and theft, reducing revenue loss. Our scalable solution ensures future-proof operations and avoids vendor lock-in.
How AI manages building and data center systems

Gridscale X LV Insights Gridscale X LV Insights is a SaaS that creates a Digital Twin of your LV grid. Automate model creation to improve data quality by 90%, identify critical segments, and make confident investment decisions.

GRIDSCALE X DER Insights Gridscale X DER Insights uncovers BTM DERs and their grid impact using an accurate model. Make data-driven decisions to prioritize upgrades, prevent issues, and fully leverage DER flexibility.

Gridscale X Advanced Protection Assessment Power accurate protection simulations with the world's largest library of 7,300+ detailed relay models. Automate wide-area coordination and streamline NERC compliance for enhanced grid reliability.

links: Video all Audi virtualizes shop floor with Siemens PLC What’s next for the automotive industry? Rainer Brehm, CEO of Siemens Factory Automation and Henning Löser, Head of Innovation at Audi, discuss the impact and benefits of industrial AI solutions.

Video all Audi’s production of the future: Powered by Siemens Standard and failsafe PLCs and applications as software just recently became a reality, thanks to our innovative SIMATIC S7-1500V virtual PLC. Let the experts inspire you about its potential.
Product all Industrial Operations X With IT capabilities and software development methods, Industrial Operations X helps make your production process more adaptive, autonomous and people centric.

Product all Industrial Edge Gain a competitive advantage when you can utilize IT on the shop floor, optimize operations, reduce costs and increase uptime. Centrally manage connected devices and easily deploy apps at scale.

Gridscale X Advanced Protection Assessment Power accurate protection simulations with the world's largest library of 7,300+ detailed relay models. Automate wide-area coordination and streamline NERC compliance for enhanced grid reliability.

Gridscale X Advanced Protection Assessment trial Request a free trial of Gridscale X Advanced Protection Assessment. Explore the capabilities of the leading, highly detailed protection simulation software and get started with your evaluation.

Gridscale X Protection Data Manager Handle growing volumes of protection data efficiently. Our software automates relay data imports, saving up to 80% of time, increasing accuracy, and providing a single source of truth for grid stability.

Home
Products

Gridscale X Advanced Protection Assessment Power accurate protection simulations with the world's largest library of 7,300+ detailed relay models. Automate wide-area coordination and streamline NERC compliance for enhanced grid reliability.

Gridscale X Protection Data Manager Handle growing volumes of protection data efficiently. Our software automates relay data imports, saving up to 80% of time, increasing accuracy, and providing a single source of truth for grid stability.

Dynamic Line Rating Gridscale X Dynamic Line Rating calculates line capacity in real-time using local weather data. Increase capacity by 10-15% over 90% of the time, reduce redispatching costs, and bridge capacity gaps.

Dynamic Security Assessment Transport 30% more power through existing lines. Our automated software provides real-time stability assessments to increase grid capacity, improve situational awareness, and prevent blackouts. Push your grid limits securely.

Gridscale X LV Insights Gridscale X LV Insights is a SaaS that creates a Digital Twin of your LV grid. Automate model creation to improve data quality by 90%, identify critical segments, and make confident investment decisions.

Advanced Distribution Management Manage grid complexity and the energy transition. Spectrum Power ADMS integrates DERs, visualizes processes, and optimizes assets across all voltage levels to ensure reliable power, reduce costs, and boost efficiency.

Gridscale X LV Management Handle outages up to 30% faster and cut model maintenance time in half with Gridscale X LV Management. This smart co-pilot SaaS provides guided workflows to enhance grid stability, optimize assets, and resupply power faster.

GRIDSCALE X DER Insights Gridscale X DER Insights uncovers BTM DERs and their grid impact using an accurate model. Make data-driven decisions to prioritize upgrades, prevent issues, and fully leverage DER flexibility.

Network Model Manager Unleash network model management with Gridscale X. Our fast, scalable, and open platform provides a single source of truth for grid data. Keep models consistent, boost team productivity, and accelerate planning and operations.

PSS E The industry benchmark for transmission planning and analysis. PSS®E delivers trusted results and unmatched automation. Save time and streamline complex workflows with over 2,000+ open Python™ APIs.

PSS SINCAL PSS®SINCAL is an all-in-one simulation software for electric and pipe networks. Reliably plan expansions, analyze protection, and integrate renewables across LV, MV, and HV systems with fast, accurate calculations.

Gridscale X Meter Data Management Simplify metering with our scalable, vendor-agnostic MDM. Automate data operations, resolve 99.9% of issues, and improve billing accuracy. Get the job done 85% faster and future-proof your utility against vendor lock-in.

Gridscale X Prepay Gridscale X Prepay protects utility revenue with a central wallet for real-time rating, flexible tariffs & debt recovery. This improves cash flow while empowering consumers with budget control & self-service.

Gridscale X Meter Data Management SaaS Manage electric, water, and gas meter data with our vendor-agnostic MDM SaaS. Avoid vendor lock-in, increase billing accuracy, and reduce TCO. Deploy 3x faster with a scalable, secure, and future-proof cloud solution.

Gridscale X Meter Data Management for Water A vendor-agnostic MDM for water utilities. Process smart meter data to detect leaks, backflow, and theft, reducing revenue loss. Our scalable solution ensures future-proof operations and avoids vendor lock-in.

summary.title: Artificial intelligence solutions | Siemens
h1: Siemens is accelerating the Industrial AI revolution
h2: Industrial AI in the real world
The impact of AI on industry and infrastructure
links: CUSTOMER STORY AI-supported maintenance enables high plant efficiency Sachsenmilch, one of the largest dairies in Europe, uses Senseye Predictive Maintenance in its heterogeneous production-plant infrastructure.
ARTICLE Busting myths on AI-based visual inspection Athina Liatsa, global marketing manager for industrial apps at Siemens, dispels five myths surrounding AI-based visual inspection.

CUSTOMER STORY Al-based apps protect Southern Europe's water resources Water scarcity poses a significant challenge in many parts of Southern Europe, demanding innovative solutions for responsible water management.
CUSTOMER STORY Guarding the plant: Robot dogs for safety & reliability By utilizing a robot version of man’s best friend, process industries can enhance worker safety and improve maintenance work.
ARTICLE Scaling industrial AI to ease skilled labor shortages An $8.5 trillion talent shortage looms. But the scaling of industrial AI is charting a path toward a brighter future.
CUSTOMER STORY BlueScope's predictive leap with Senseye Bluescope is transforming its maintenance approach and making it future-proof by relying on Senseye Predictive Maintenance.
How AI manages building and data center systems
How AI supports transport and logistics operations

Gridscale X Meter Data Management Simplify metering with our scalable, vendor-agnostic MDM. Automate data operations, resolve 99.9% of issues, and improve billing accuracy. Get the job done 85% faster and future-proof your utility against vendor lock-in.

Gridscale X Prepay Gridscale X Prepay protects utility revenue with a central wallet for real-time rating, flexible tariffs & debt recovery. This improves cash flow while empowering consumers with budget control & self-service.

Gridscale X Meter Data Management SaaS Manage electric, water, and gas meter data with our vendor-agnostic MDM SaaS. Avoid vendor lock-in, increase billing accuracy, and reduce TCO. Deploy 3x faster with a scalable, secure, and future-proof cloud solution.

Gridscale X Meter Data Management for Water A vendor-agnostic MDM for water utilities. Process smart meter data to detect leaks, backflow, and theft, reducing revenue loss. Our scalable solution ensures future-proof operations and avoids vendor lock-in.

summary.title: Digital twin technology | Siemens
h1: Digital twin technology
h2: Empower innovation with digital twin use cases
Discover how companies use digital twin technology
links: all Digital twins power the industrial metaverse revolution Explore dynamic use cases of digital twins to drive sustainability, enhance design efficiency and accelerate development

all Enhance design with a digital process twin advantage A digital twin transforms design, making you a standout partner. It boosts efficiency and sustainability and cuts rework, reducing time to market. Elevate safety and lower costs with innovative solutions like gPROMS.

all Simulate processes, enhance pharmaceutical development Digital twins merge real and digital worlds, capturing data to optimize processes. Simulate and test in-silico to detect issues early and improve controls, accelerating pharmaceutical product development.

all Hymer Digital transformation in camper design Hymer leverages Siemens Xcelerator for the digital creation and prototyping of Venture S, transforming the process from design to production with efficient digital twins.

all Ráječek Farm Innovating strawberry harvesting AI-powered digital twin technology optimizes sustainable strawberry farming by improving monitoring and harvesting efficiency, reducing manual labor and cutting costs.

all Natilus Revolutionizing air cargo Natilus uses Siemens Xcelerator for innovative aircraft design, enhancing sustainability with reduced fuel consumption and immersive engineering solutions through augmented reality.

all Comprehensive digital twin manufacturing Whitepaper Outperform your competitors by leveraging a comprehensive digital twin to design, simulate and optimize products, machines, production and entire plants in the digital world, before bringing them to life in the real world.

all Time travel with the digital twin Story Simulation is key for adapting to today’s changing environment. Using this tech helps companies stay competitive, tackle industry challenges and drive digital transformation—with digital twins playing a vital role.

summary.title: Infrastructure | Siemens
h1: Infrastructure
h2: Discover how companies use infrastructure technology
links: all Building X Our digital building platform, Building X, will help you make data-driven decisions to improve sustainability, operations and building performance.

all Electrification X This SaaS offering helps TSOs, DSOs, industries and Infrastructure customers manage their energy networks; increase uptime; and improve reliability, asset utilization, energy efficiency, sustainability and cybersecurity.
all Grid software Designed to accelerate the energy transition of grids by adding mission-critical capabilities, this software helps grid operators decode and shape the future power landscape.

all Railigent X ecosystem Railigent X delivers a digital services portfolio, integrating third-party and in-house apps. This flexible ecosystem meets operator, maintainer and owner needs, enhancing offerings with diverse solutions and adaptability.

all AcegasApsAmga Digital twin enhances Trieste's grid Siemens partners with AcegasApsAmga to utilize Gridscale X technology for a digital twin of Trieste’s energy grid, enhancing situational awareness and reducing port pollution.

all COIMA Milan building becomes energy-efficient Siemens and COIMA revamp Milan’s 65-year-old Pirelli 35 into a smart, energy-efficient building, reducing energy use by 60% and carbon dioxide emissions by 2,000 tons annually.

all DB Energie Enhancing grid and rail efficiency Siemens provides DB Energie with advanced software to upgrade transmission grid operations, enhancing efficiency and reliability across Germany’s rail network.

all The power of “local” in the global energy transition As climate impacts grow, scalable energy-as-a-service aids transition to decarbonized energy. Siemens invests in local ecosystems, leveraging global expertise for reliable, resilient energy solutions.

all AI transformation in buildings Story AI boosts building efficiency by optimizing HVACs and operations through sensor data. This reduces energy use and costs, driving the move toward autonomous, sustainable buildings while improving profitability.

all Microgrid empowerment in Upper Blinkwater Story Upper Blinkwater’s microgrid transforms lives with reliable, sustainable energy from solar and diesel power, boosting economic growth and reducing poverty.

Gridscale X LV Management Handle outages up to 30% faster and cut model maintenance time in half with Gridscale X LV Management. This smart co-pilot SaaS provides guided workflows to enhance grid stability, optimize assets, and resupply power faster.

Network Model Manager Unleash network model management with Gridscale X. Our fast, scalable, and open platform provides a single source of truth for grid data. Keep models consistent, boost team productivity, and accelerate planning and operations.

PSS E The industry benchmark for transmission planning and analysis. PSS®E delivers trusted results and unmatched automation. Save time and streamline complex workflows with over 2,000+ open Python™ APIs.

PSS SINCAL PSS®SINCAL is an all-in-one simulation software for electric and pipe networks. Reliably plan expansions, analyze protection, and integrate renewables across LV, MV, and HV systems with fast, accurate calculations.

Gridscale X Meter Data Management Simplify metering with our scalable, vendor-agnostic MDM. Automate data operations, resolve 99.9% of issues, and improve billing accuracy. Get the job done 85% faster and future-proof your utility against vendor lock-in.

Gridscale X Prepay Gridscale X Prepay protects utility revenue with a central wallet for real-time rating, flexible tariffs & debt recovery. This improves cash flow while empowering consumers with budget control & self-service.

Gridscale X Meter Data Management SaaS Manage electric, water, and gas meter data with our vendor-agnostic MDM SaaS. Avoid vendor lock-in, increase billing accuracy, and reduce TCO. Deploy 3x faster with a scalable, secure, and future-proof cloud solution.

Gridscale X Meter Data Management for Water A vendor-agnostic MDM for water utilities. Process smart meter data to detect leaks, backflow, and theft, reducing revenue loss. Our scalable solution ensures future-proof operations and avoids vendor lock-in.
How AI manages building and data center systems

Gridscale X LV Insights Gridscale X LV Insights is a SaaS that creates a Digital Twin of your LV grid. Automate model creation to improve data quality by 90%, identify critical segments, and make confident investment decisions.

GRIDSCALE X DER Insights Gridscale X DER Insights uncovers BTM DERs and their grid impact using an accurate model. Make data-driven decisions to prioritize upgrades, prevent issues, and fully leverage DER flexibility.

Gridscale X Advanced Protection Assessment Power accurate protection simulations with the world's largest library of 7,300+ detailed relay models. Automate wide-area coordination and streamline NERC compliance for enhanced grid reliability.
